data.title: Identity verification using Amazon Rekognition
data.authors: Nate Bachmeier, Amit Gupta, Lauren Mullennex, Anthony Pasquariello
data.tags: Amazon Machine Learning, Amazon Rekognition, Artificial Intelligence
data.description: In-person user identity verification is slow to scale, costly, and high friction for users. Machine learning (ML) powered facial recognition technology can enable online user identity verification. Amazon Rekognition offers pre-trained facial recognition capabilities that you can quickly add to your user onboarding and authentication workflows to verify opted-in users’ identities online. No ML expertise […]
